dmca.title: [EV1-C1994255I] Urgent help
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, December 02, 2006 5:03 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C1994255I] Urgent help

From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [EV1-C1994255I] Urgent help

For your review. 

--
Regards,
Abuse Department
The Planet - EV1Servers
http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html
http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx
http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx

MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, I have an account with scriptlance.com whom works with
convexdigital.com whom are hosted using theplanet.com. You host
scriptlance.com 
 
The problem is that convexdigital.com has posted a link on
scriptlance.com for my develepmental website which is confdential and
protected under international copyright law. 
 
Icann claim convexdigital.com are at fault becase they posted the
violation, but also scriptlance are too because they allowed the
violation on their website. 
 
Please help get this sorted out. 
 
The post can be found by searching for sdjohnstone on scriptlance and
then is linked on the review. 
 
Please take care of this problem or I will be forced to get a court
order to do so. 
 
Thank you 
 
Simon Johnstone
253 208-1152
